name: Geneva
description:
Loads of soldiers are landing on your beach! They are crawling all over the place!

Luckily you have a tank, lots of canonball and ou are villain as can be.

Killing soldiers is pointless and not much fun, just hurt them by making canonball roll over them. Don't kill them, they'll call for a medic and... THIS IS WHAT YOU WANT, KILL DEM MEDICS, SCREW GENEVA CONVENTIONS!!!

Kill as much medic as you can, you sadistic villain!
